title: Remco Evenepoel Powers to Fastest TT Win Ever on Monster 68t Chainring
content:
Evenepoel outclassed the field to open a 32-second gap on Isaac del Toro with brutal Jebel Mobrah climb looming Wednesday.

Read the full article at Remco Evenepoel Powers to Fastest TT Win Ever on Monster 68t Chainring on Velo.
author: ahood
